title: K/DA Tahm Kench
body:
This blew up on Reddit so I'll post the version with visuals. Credits to @prunneldesaphir on IG

https://i.ibb.co/bX0xvGX/jSkzrvs.jpg

The passive symbol is the logo "K , D , A" and for each stack, one music note plays, until he reaches full stack, a snippet of a song can be heard.

https://i.ibb.co/NTZLmjX/Untitled.png

When he lands his Q, a random piano note plays.

https://i.ibb.co/z2K6XYY/2.png

E shield is a fabulous spinning disco ball

https://i.ibb.co/2t9wKzw/3.png

When he eats an ally/enemy, they can hear some EDM music with a low pass filter (Aka the “outside a club” effect.) Tahm and allies can pick between tracks. Better watch out, Madam Kermit can serve some chart-smashing banging bops in his belly.

https://soundcloud.com/user-643864609/music

When he ults, nearby enemies hear the build-up from POP/STARS and once he arrives the song chorus briefly plays.

https://i.ibb.co/4N8mqk4/abilities.png

Now he's not the only one starving ♥

replies.body: I am horrified, but can't stop looking. The tiny hat!
Tahm Kench main checking in.  I would buy this skin in a failed flash instant
Probably the only way to balance a 44% WR champ in this game is actually a new skin :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot bunniez,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=fBqbkGif,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-04-18T17:44:46.185+0000)
>
> I am horrified, but can't stop looking. The tiny hat!

Wow, riot's got some crazy upvote bots.
Take your negativity elsewhere.

> [{quoted}](name=LordMordeMain,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=fBqbkGif,comment-id=000600010001,timestamp=2019-04-20T02:06:53.854+0000)
>
> Take your negativity elsewhere.

I'll keep my criticism where it deserves to be, thank you very much.
It wasn't criticism. Criticism implies adding to a conversation in a meaningful way, not making baseless accusations for the sake of voicing your displeasure over unrelated subject matter.
Bouncer Tahm Kench

why stop with just Tahm we need Bouncer Braum and Graves and Taric and Gragus....

thats hot

this game isnt ready for this kinda hot

dat Ass
{{sticker:sg-jinx}}
amazing
No longer being able to make money as a support, Tahm turns to a life of being a G class popstar .
This is both horrifying and beautiful. Riot, make this skin so you can take my money.
This is terrifying, but hilarious. And disturbingly thought out.
This is the skin we never thought we needed, but clearly we do.
wait what is the name of the second track?

Xilent - Pixel Journey

K/DA Manager Tahm Kench

Bouncer Tahm ftw
Add Zac as well for em duo Bouncers

Well, uh.

That is a thing.
Oh my God, the Swallow Music (filtered) has me in tears
It's really juicy. I would pay $20 for it. But I'm still waiting for the star guardian Urgot skin.
